vpn.common.delete.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete {{param}}?

vpn.configurations.name: Connection
vpn.configurations.addItemInfoText:
This VPN (Virtual Private Network) client app establishes a secure connection between this device and a VPN server.
"Upload VPN configuration file" transfers an existing file, which contains the VPN connection information, from a PC/tablet to this device.
Alternatively, make all settings for a new VPN connection via "Add VPN connection".
vpn.configurations.deleteConnection.title: Delete connection

vpn.configEditor.name: Name
vpn.configEditor.configAlreadyExisting: There is already a connection with this name.
vpn.configEditor.noCredentialFilesUploaded.tooltip: No credential files have been uploaded yet
vpn.configEditor.optionManualDescr: The connection must be started manually by clicking start button
vpn.configEditor.optionAutomaticDescr: The connection is started automatically on device startup. Manual start and stop is also possible
vpn.configEditor.optionDataLayerDescr: The connection state is controlled exclusively by a DataLayer node
vpn.configEditor.triggerInputPlaceholder: Address of the DataLayer node that controls the connection status
vpn.configEditor.connectionStatusPropagationDescr: Propagate connection status to DataLayer node
vpn.configEditor.indicatorInputPlaceholder: Address of the DataLayer node that will receive the connection status
vpn.configEditor.triggerTest.tooltip: Click to read the data layer node
vpn.configEditor.indicatorTest.tooltip: Press and hold to set the data layer node to true until release

vpn.addConfigDialog.title: Add connection
vpn.addConfigDialog.name: Name
vpn.addConfigDialog.connectionAlreadyExistingMsg: There is already a connection with this name.

vpn.notification.errorMissingPermissions: You do not have the required permissions.
vpn.notification.cantSaveDataIsInvalidMsg: Saving not possible. The data entered is incomplete or invalid.
vpn.notification.cantImportExisingConfigurations: Cannot import, as the following connections already exist: {{param}}
vpn.notification.notABoolDataLayerNode: The specified DataLayer node is not of type bool8.

vpn.alertBoxFactoryService.title: Unsaved changes on {{param}}
vpn.alertBoxFactoryService.saveDiscardCancelDescription: You made changes to this item. You can save your changes, discard your changes or cancel to continue editing.
vpn.alertBoxFactoryService.discardCancelDescription: You made changes to this item. You can discard your changes or cancel to continue editing.
